nodes.text: Nevoota stimulant pollen was a type of pollen associated with the Nevoota. By 10 BBY, the pirate queen Maz Kanata included the pollen on a list in the book known as the Smuggler's Guide that included cargoes worth most profit per kilogram for smugglers to carry.
Nevoota stimulant pollen was first mentioned in Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, a reference book written by Daniel Wallace and released in 2018.
